sections.general: e-learning designer career overview highly skilled and experienced educator with a strong background in information technology. adept at addressing the needs of a variety of learners and administrators. strongly knowledgeable about all approaches to distance learning. qualifications vast experience with e-learning development software ability to create training modules, storyboards and content outlines strong understanding of teaching methodologies proven ability to work with multiple parties in collaboration extensive knowledge of emergent and current technologies high proficiency with html and authoring tools excellent organizational and management skills
